text: Mends is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Bright Middleton Mends (born 1992), Ghanaian footballer *Christopher Mends (1724–1799), Welsh Methodist minister *Edward Ebo Mends (born 2000), Ghanaian footballer *Esme Mends (born 1986), Ghanaian footballer *Frank Mends Stone (1857–1942), Australian lawyer and politician *Robert Mends (c. 1767–1823), British Royal Navy officer *T. D. Brodie-Mends (1929–2013), Ghanaian journalist, lawyer and politician *William Robert Mends (1812–1897), British admiral of the Royal Navy == See also == *Mends Street Jetty, is located in South Perth in Western Australia. *Nüwa Mends the Heavens, is a well-known theme in Chinese culture
title: Mends
